l: CI/CD for your Flutter Project with GitHub Actions
p: This project is a demo for my talk given at Flisol SCESI 2022. Here you'll find an implementation of Continous Integration / Continous Deployment using GitHub Actions!
The following things are covered by this CI/CD implementation:
Generation of .md documentation to a webpage.
Generation of doc comments to a API documentation webpage.
The GitHub Actions used for this project are:
Flutter workflow from Very good workflows, developed by Very Good Ventures.
Retype github pages action, with some additional configurations.

For the generation of a static webpage from .md files, this project makes use of Retype. For the generation of a static API documentation webpage from doc comments inside source code, this project uses Dartdoc.
